reference.title: cxxStructAccessSpecifier
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxStructAccessSpecifier> element describes the access modifier applied to the members of the struct.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStructAccessSpecifier> element does not have any children. <cxxStructAccessSpecifier> uses the attribute value to describe the access modifier for the members of the struct. value can be set to "public", "protected" or "private"; the default is "public".

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxStructDefinition> <cxxStructAccessSpecifier value="public" /> <cxxStructAPIItemLocation> <cxxStructDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="s:/sf/os/commsfw/commsconfig/commsdatabaseshim/commdbshim/SCDB/CDBTABLE.CPP" /> <cxxStructDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="36" /> <cxxStructDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="41" /> </cxxStructAPIItemLocation> </cxxStructDefinition>
